entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Sapio Primer
entry.summary: In a recent post by Jeremy Rubin, he introduces Sapio and provides links to more comprehensive documentation. Sapio is a system for expressing Bitcoin ideas that has made significant progress since its previous mention in this list. It is believed to be an excellent platform for expressing Bitcoin ideas, even if one doesn't intend to use it for their production implementation. Furthermore, most of the future posts in the series will be heavily dependent on Sapio, making it essential for readers to get comfortable with.
